Items.name: compass
Items.description: Always points South West

Items.name: potted plant
Items.description: Very green, just about to flower

Items.name: nursery rhyme
Items.description: Someone has spilt coffee on it

Items.name: calculator
Items.description: Looks brand new, whoever had this obviously doesn't need it

Items.name: puppy
Items.description: She's SO CUTE

Items.name: vision board
Items.description: Visualise and you shall achieve

Items.name: penknife
Items.description: It's so rusted the knife doesn't work

Items.name: hair tie
Items.description: wait... are they diamonds?!

Items.name: Jeff Bezos cut out
Items.description: It's missing a leg and someone has drawn a mustache on it

Items.name: used car
Items.description: Hammer the dents out and a lick of paint it'll be like brand new

Items.name: 20 sided dice
Items.description: It's glowing with some kind of energy

Items.name: book of child's drawings
Items.description: Each page is a brand new horror but it is covered in glitter

Items.name: mushroom
Items.description: Will restore you to full health or kill you, I can't remember

Items.name: jar of student's tears
Items.description: Some say this grants you enteral life. Can only be used by David

Items.name: bash script
Items.description: It automates your decision making

Items.name: PhD certificate
Items.description: Free entry to the secret societies

Items.name: microphone
Items.description: Each use adds another like to your facebook post, batteries not included

Items.name: yellow mac
Items.description: Great for rainy days and fighting off sewer clowns

Items.name: leather scraps
Items.description: Offcuts of leather, can be used for repairs.

Items.name: smiths hammer
Items.description: As shiny as the day it was made, lighter then you would think.

Items.name: tiny silver spoon
Items.description: This small silver spoon is the definition of elegance, it has a tiny silver crest on the handle.

Items.name: dirty tankard
Items.description: You have to hope thats old mead left in there.

Items.name: cracked steak knife
Items.description: Well used with a dull edge, if used will break

Items.name: right slipper
Items.description: You can see yourself through the hole in the sole.

Items.name: lumpy pillow
Items.description: Comfier than you'd expect, although very discoloured

Items.name: teddy bear
Items.description: When you look into it's soulful eyes, you can swear you hear a voice.

Items.name: soap on a rope
Items.description: Brand new soap, very old rope.

Items.name: moldy cheese sandwich
Items.description: Good thing cheese gets tastier with age.

Items.name: bean bag
Items.description: A small hole has caused this bean bag to be more bag than bean.

Items.name: old book
Items.description: Filled with diagrams and scrawled notes in the columns.

Locations.name: Old Smithy
Locations.description: A dimly lit room with blacksmith equipment scattered everywhere. All in great condition and could be useful to fix broken items.

Locations.name: Storage Room
Locations.description: Empty shelves and racks cover the walls, they seem to be stripped bare.

Locations.name: Dining Hall
Locations.description: Filled with long tables and benches, you get the impression that an army could eat here.

Locations.name: Dorms
Locations.description: A number of bed that have been left unmade, with one pristinely made bed in the corner

Locations.name: Shower Block
Locations.description: Tiled room full of shower cubicles, one of the cubicles tiles looks out of place.

Locations.name: Toilet
Locations.description: You know what it is, you don't want to be here.

Locations.name: Secret Room
Locations.description: Shelves filled with books, and a pile of blankets in the corner.

Locations.name: Large Double Doors
Locations.description: These massive ornate doors can be opened to leave the building.
